text:
Jof Davies built a LinkedIn-to-WordPress automation pipeline.

System features:
- Scraping LinkedIn URLs using Phantombuster into Google Sheets.
- Cleaning and filtering records for automation readiness.
- Using Webhooks to extract LinkedIn content and associated media.
- Generating rewritten articles through ChatGPT for publication.
- Posting images and articles directly into WordPress.
- Updating source spreadsheets and sending success/failure notifications.

This automation replaces manual editorial workflows, providing consistent, publish-ready content with minimal human involvement.
